# Origin of the name Cowgitz {.unnumbered #sec-origin-cowgitz}

The proper name of the Cowgitz area in the Haida language is 'G̱aaw Giids'.

Source:

Gid yahk’ii, Sean Young, Manager/Curator of Collections and Archaeology
Saahlinda Naay. Saving Things House
Haida Gwaii Museum at Kay Llnagaay

An AI search indicates that the Haida words 'G̱aaw Giids' form part of a place name and do not have a direct, simple English translation for the combined term.

* 'G̱aaw' relates to a specific location (related to the former name of the village).
* 'Giids' means village or place.
